text: Pandora| Sr Software Engineer Analytics| Oakland, CA|onsite| https://pandora.com/careers/position?id=oSMG4fw8 |Data engineers at Pandora are responsible for the services and infrastructure capable of processing and making available the extensive volume of data produced on its platform each day. Analytics developers build the infrastructure needed to enable analysts and scientists to query and author data products that operate against our largest collections (>1B events/day).
